definition: net-like object/to hold sth in place with a net/to wind/to twist/(TCM) channels in the human body
to agree (to do sth)/should/ought to/must/(legal) shall
to answer/to respond/to comply with/to deal or cope with
to use/to employ/to have to/to eat or drink/expense or outlay/usefulness/hence/therefore

sentences.english: Instant communication is Chinese Internet most one of all-pervading network application.
sentences.chinese: 即時通訊是中國互聯網最爲普及的網絡應用之一。

sentences.english: Corporations have had the precursor of social networks for ages.
sentences.chinese: 很長時間以來，企業都是社會化網絡應用的先驅。

sentences.english: Google Maps is a good example of a web app.
sentences.chinese: 谷歌地圖就是一個網絡應用程序的很好的例子。

sentences.english: That doesn't mean that offline access to web apps has been perfected.
sentences.chinese: 這並不意味着離線訪問網絡應用程序已經無可挑剔了。

sentences.english: Transformed the company from a content provider to a large-scale web application developer.
sentences.chinese: 將公司從內容供應商轉型爲大規模的網絡應用開發商。

sentences.english: At the same time, Apple is pushing hard on its web applications.
sentences.chinese: 與此同時，蘋果也在大力推廣自己的網絡應用程序。

sentences.english: Current, online music is one of the most popular network application.
sentences.chinese: 目前，在線音樂是最熱門的網絡應用之一。

sentences.english: Social network applications are becoming a part of corporate life.
sentences.chinese: 社交網絡應用程序已成爲企業的一部分。

sentences.english: Live technical help with web application problems .
sentences.chinese: 關於網絡應用程序的技術問題解答。

sentences.english: Many popular web applications have been ported to mobile platforms already.
sentences.chinese: 很多成功的網絡應用已經被移植到移動平臺上鳥。

sentences.english: Much of our time on the Web is now spent in Web apps.
sentences.chinese: 現在我們大部分時間都花在網絡應用程序上。

sentences.english: Samples regression is an important issue in the field of Dynamic Constructive Neural Network(DCNN).
sentences.chinese: 樣本點擬合是動態構造神經網絡應用的重要研究領域。

sentences.english: In the paper, the wavelet neural network is applied in fault diagnosis of the gear-box.
sentences.chinese: 本文將小波神經網絡應用到齒輪箱故障診斷當中。

sentences.english: Unit testing and web applications to be unhappy bedfellows.
sentences.chinese: 單元測試和網絡應用程序不快樂同牀異夢。

sentences.english: The application of offline net has potential development.
sentences.chinese: 離線網絡應用具備發展潛力。
